attributes.additional_details: It is stifling free speech, it’s controlling the public’s access to information whilst creating false/bias narratives.
attributes.background: Enquiry into social media censorship by platforms such as Instagram and Facebook and its affects on freedom of speech. Set up a committee to review the rules and regulations around social media censorship so they can be regulated and designed to be fair.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. The Government aren't responsible for the editorial policies of social media.

You might like to sign this petition:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/569783
